snippet: Ben S. Bernanke said that the Federal Reserve expected the economy to gain strength in the coming months, potentially allowing the central bank to decelerate its stimulus campaign.
abstract: Federal Reserve Chairman Ben S Bernanke emphasizes the central bank remains committed to bolstering the economy, insisting that any deceleration in Fed's stimulus campaign will happen because it is achieving its goals, not because it has lowered its sights.
lead_paragraph: Ben S. Bernanke said that the Federal Reserve expected the economy to gain strength in the coming months, potentially allowing the central bank to decelerate its stimulus campaign.

headline.main: Fed Chief Reaffirms Fervor for Stimulus
headline.print_headline: Fed Chief Reaffirms Fervor for Stimulus
